title: Preload Contact Us hero background to eliminate grey flash on reload

requirements.summary: Preload the existing Contact Us hero background image and apply the same preload behavior used on other pages, without changing hero visuals or layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Hard-refreshing (/contact) does not show a grey hero background before the hero image appears; the background image is visible immediately on first paint or as close as technically possible with preloading (matching the Home hero experience).
The Contact Us hero background image URL remains exactly the same as currently used: /assets/pexels-sora-shimazaki-5668882.jpg.
No change to hero background positioning (e.g., bg-center / background-position), sizing (bg-cover), or layout spacing.
Preload is implemented using the same approach already used elsewhere in the project (e.g., head preload hints and/or the existing usePreloadImages hook).

file_operations.description: Introduce a Contact hero image constant set to the exact URL /assets/pexels-sora-shimazaki-5668882.jpg, and preload it using the existing usePreloadImages hook (same pattern as About/Services). Keep the hero background elementâ€™s existing bg-cover/bg-center classes and layout unchanged; only adjust loading behavior and wiring.

requirements.summary: Add a preload hint in index.html for the Contact Us hero background image to improve first paint on direct navigation/reload.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html includes a <link rel='preload' as='image' href='/assets/pexels-sora-shimazaki-5668882.jpg' /> entry alongside the other critical hero image preloads.
No existing preload hints are removed.

file_operations.description: Add a new image preload hint for /assets/pexels-sora-shimazaki-5668882.jpg alongside the existing critical hero image preloads, without removing or altering existing preload entries.
